extendedInfo.description: The Eagle-Tribune is the number one source for local news in the Merrimack Valley of Massachusetts and Southern New Hampshire. This Pulitzer Prize-winning newspaper has been delivering news to readers for over 100 years. Now take The Eagle-Tribune with you on your Android device with the Eagle-Tribune App.FEATURESBreaking NewsWhen it happens you will know about it anywhere, at any time. Sign up for text alerts at eagletribune.com/text for the perfect combination.NewsRead all the local news from the Merrimack Valley and Southern New Hampshire. Whether it is news from your neighborhood, government news or following up on the sirens you heard around the corner, find it all here.SportsFrom your local school to the Boston and New England teams, we cover sports for you. Our sports staff knows scholastic sports, college sports and pro sports and has strong opinions on what they see on the field. Be a sports expert with all the answers in the palm of your handLifestyle and EntertainmentWhether it is a local concert or theater event or the release of a new book or movie, the Eagle-Tribune App will allow you to plan your free time.OpinionsThe democratic process means you get a voice and an opinion about our society. Read the opinions of others and offer your own on the news of the day.VideoEvery day the Eagle-Tribune App will feature news videos that coincide with the hot topics and stories of the day.PhotosOur award winning photographers capture the life of the community and reflect it back to you. See photos that did not appear in the newspaper.Share Would you like to share a favorite story with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or Email? It is as simple as a click away. Send us your news Now you are the reporter and photographer! Send us a photo, video or story right from your Android device. The "Submit Your News" feature makes it so easy to send us dramatic breaking news or coverage of community events. Weather Whether you are heading to the beach or to the slopes, the Eagle-Tribune App will let you check the weather locally or at your destination. Be warned about severe the weather and check the local radar. Save Stories See something that catches your eye, but don't have time to read it right away? With the click of a button you can save any story or video for later viewing, even if you are not connected to the internet.

reviews.title: Enjoy it!
reviews.comment: Nice to see continued development and improvement of the app. Grew up in Haverhill but a Midwesterner now.  And mingya this keeps me up to date and informed. Good job dev!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A step back.
reviews.comment: New update is more difficult to navigate and not customizable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Takes forever to load content.
reviews.author: David Elias

reviews.title: Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: Another 4.2 user. Crashes upon start up.
reviews.author: Kristopher White

reviews.title: Jellybean 4.2
reviews.comment: This application crashes on startup on any Android device running jellybean 4.2.   Please fix!!!  Still not fixed with latest update.
reviews.author: Brandon Cote

reviews.title: Lots of Forced Stops on Galaxy SIII
reviews.comment: This app has lots of Forced Stops on the Galaxy SIII.  If fact, if you restart the phone, a forced stop is one of the first notifications you receive.  Not sure if it is specific to the phone or ICS.  Needless to say, it has been uninstalled and I read the Eagle Tribune on the phone\'s browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Really good
reviews.author: Jovanna Soto

reviews.title: Force stops
reviews.comment: Generic UI and force stops on Nexus. Will check back to see if this gets fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constant force stop
reviews.comment: This app would be a five if it didnt force stop EVERYTIME I TURN ON MY PHONE
reviews.author: johnny gordon

reviews.comment: Wish it was jus as good as the actuall news paper ..a lot of typos ..same story posted 3 times..and app rarly updated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Always Stopping!
reviews.comment: Never works...so disappointed.
reviews.author: Trish Faucher

reviews.title: Too many permissions needed.
reviews.comment: UnInstalling.  Too many permissions needed, especially \"start at boot \342\200\235. All these unnecessary start at boot apps are slowing down my phone to frustrating levels.  Get rid of excess permissions and i will re install.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No World News?
reviews.comment: Very easy navigation and newsfeed is always current.. barely any world news, lacks broad perspective. Overall app is good and I\'ll recommend it. Ny Times is more of my taste too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best of the best
reviews.comment: Always the source for tv news

reviews.comment: The UI needs a some work, but on the right track
